name: cse-mathematica-fa13
tagline: Page for aggregating materials pertaining to the CS&E Mathematica short course.
body:
### Computational Science and Engineering
# Mathematica for Beginners

Please open the [Etherpad](http://meetingwords.com/ehlagqUook) for sharing code snippets during the course.  These can be pasted directly into _Mathematica_ and evaluated using Shift+Return.

Please fill out the [pre-course assessment](http://bit.ly/19Dtf2G).  (This questionnaire is anonymous and helps us know how to better tune the course to your needs and backgrounds.)

## Session 1:  Scope, environment, evaluation, variables, symbolics, numerics
[Notes from Etherpad](https://uofi.box.com/s/hyzwthcgi0h0uvzhew98)

[In-class notebook](https://uofi.box.com/s/k63vb2xvxnxnoegxx41n)

[Exercises](https://uofi.box.com/s/8668dv7ugc0n3l14ttwy) [Solutions](https://uofi.box.com/s/1llx32n26owwghlhis4i)

## Session 2:  Differential equations, numerics, data sets, input/output, dimensional analysis
Monday section:

In-class notebooks:  [Pendulum/heat equation](https://uofi.box.com/s/yaab2f2yputco6ggr4m1) [Genome sequencing](https://uofi.box.com/s/0ohejdubybex34j3gqjw) [Element data](https://uofi.box.com/s/d3egunoomiw5t404oljs)

[Exercises]()

## Session 3:  Optimization, vectors and matrices, visualization
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
